description:
Title: Farewell
Year: 1983 (but in the end credits of N-th 1981)
Genre: Drama
Directed by Elem Klimov
Cast: Stephanie Stanyuta, Lev Durov, Alexei Petrenko, Leonid Hook, Vadim Yakovenko, Yuri Katin-Yartsev Denis looping, Maya Bulgakov Naidan Gendunova, Galina Demin ...

About the film: For the construction of hydropower island village of Matera to be flooded. A few of its inhabitants are preparing to relocate and, each in their own way, say goodbye to their homes.
The film is conceived and initiated by Larisa Shepitko. After her tragic death has completed shooting her husband, film director Elem Klimov. He also changed the name of "Farewell to the mothers" became simply "Farewell." The film is based on a story "Farewell to the mothers' Valentin Rasputin.
